Class TestSqlConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • DatabaseConnectors.TestSqlConnection

  • public class TestSqlConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    Version:
    V2.0 [Date Created: 6 Jun 2014]
    Author:
    Thomas & Sam, V2.0 Prashant [Final Refactoring and commenting] Test case for testing the SqlConnection

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connectionCloseTest()
      Tests that the connection closes correctly
      void connectionOpenTest()
      Tests for an instance of connection and that the connection is not closed
      void createProductTest()
      Test that creates a new product, searches for it in the database, then prints the productid to the console This value is then visually compared, and the product is deleted.
      void getListByCategoryTest()
      Test getListByCategory to ensure that it returns a filtered version of a list by a selected category.
      void getListOfFavouritesTest()
      Test that getListOfFavourites by sending a category number first test - "1" should return all favourites second test - "3" should return all favourties in that category.
      void getListOfOffersTest()
      Test that the getListOfOffers() returns the full list of offers from the database by printing it to the console and then comparing it.
      void getListOfProductsTest()
      Tests that the getListOfProducts() returns a full list of the product data from the database by printing it to the console and manually comparing it.
      void getListTest()
      Test getList() to ensure it returns the contents of a List
      void getOffersByCategoryTest()
      Test that the getOfferByCatergory returns a filtered list of the offers available.
      void getProductByNameTest()
      Test that the database returns the correct information corresponding to a product when queried by name
      void getSpecificCategoryNumberTest()
      Tests that the database returns the correct category number when a category name is given
      void getSpecificProductTest()
      Test getSpecificProduct method by sending a column name and a value and should return a result
      void sendQueryTest()
      Sends and example query to the database Checks that the database returns something then tests that the returned values are correct for the sent query
      void setup()
      Creates an instance of SqlConnection before the tests are performed
      void tearDown()
      THis method runs after every test, and cleans up after the test Closes the connection after all tests are run

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
